processingCommand.script:
:SET &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &UNDEPLOYDB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,UNDEPLOYDB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &UNDEPLOY_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,UNDEPLOY_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &TZ# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,TIME_ZONE,1)
:SET &PRECHECKDB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,PRECHECKDB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &POSTCHECKDB_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,POSTCHECKDB_SCRIPT_NAME,1)
:SET &INACTIVEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V,INACTIVEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME,1)

:PUB &POSTCHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &UNDEPLOYDB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &UNDEPLOY_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &PRECHECK_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &TZ#
:PUB &PRECHECKDB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &CRONTAB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &POSTCHECKDB_SCRIPT_NAME#
:PUB &INACTIVEZABBIX_SCRIPT_NAME#

:SET &RUN_ID#      = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR()
:SET &RUN_ID#      = FORMAT(&RUN_ID#)
!:PUBLISH &RUN_ID#,,WORKFLOW

! INC/CTASK
:SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""

:IF &TICKET# = "null"
:  SET &TICKET# = ""
:  PUBLISH &TICKET#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF

:IF &TICKET# <> ""
:  SET &INC# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,3)
:  SET &CTA# = SUBSTR(&TICKET#,1,5)
:  IF &INC# = "INC"
:    SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "INC"
:  ELSE
:    IF &CTA# = "CTASK"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = "CTASK"
:    ELSE
:      PRINT "WARNING - No valid INC/CTASK!"
:      SET &TICKET_TYPE# = ""
:    ENDIF
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &TICKET_TYPE#

! Get current time and date
:SET &TIME_NOW#  = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS","&TZ#")
:SET &DATE_NOW#  = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL("YYYY-MM-DD","&TZ#")
:PUBLISH &TIME_NOW#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &DATE_NOW#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &REST_MODULES# = "WMS,REFS,RW,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = "WMS,REFS,EMS"
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES_DB#,,WORKFLOW

! Instance name uppercase
:SET &INSTANCE_NAME_UC# = STR_UC(&INSTANCE_NAME#)
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_NAME_UC#,,WORKFLOW

! Login
:SET &MODULE_LOGIN# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "LOGIN", 1)
:PUBLISH &MODULE_LOGIN#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID# = ""
:PUBLISH &CLOSE_NUMBER_ID#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS# = ""
:PUBLISH &CTASK_UPDATE_STATUS#,,WORKFLOW

! Event Assignment Group
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP_PROD", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE", 1)
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "True"

! STRY0029851 - always assign to LATAM L2
:SET &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#  = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UNDEPLOY.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP", 1)
:SET &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE# = ""
:SET &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV# = "False"

:PUBLISH &EVENT_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &PROD_ASSIGNMENT_MESSAGE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &JDA_REBUILD_IS_PROV#,,WORKFLOW

! Incident Site Update
:SET &INC_SITE_UPDATE# = "false"
:PUBLISH &INC_SITE_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
